name: Despairship
description:
“Okay, maybe this one man crew idea wasn’t the best when it comes to piloting an airship. But who could I trust other than myself, really? For now, let’s try and stay afloat”.

***

Story: yup, it’s a time-space anomaly alright. With my airship’s current speed, it should only take about a minute to pass it through, but I am needed in several places at the same time, and I only have my own two hands to rely on.

But wait. Maybe I can use this loop to my advantage. As long as I plan my actions accordingly, I can be at several places at the same time, even going as far as preventing troubles before they actually happen!
I mean, all I need to do is dodge my earlier copies when I’m working. Easy, right?

  • Keep the airship systems functional and nicely green!
  • React to special events, or suffer massive damage!
  • Avoid your own clones when things get too cramped!
  • Reach the end of the anomaly with your ship intact!
  • Play in browser!

Controls: keyboard only. Use [W][A][S][D] or [ARROW KEYS] to move, press or hold [E], [X] or [ENTER] to interact. You can always leave the zone before the repairs are completed and return later, and clear up the debris to create shortcuts. 
Check out additional hints by reading tutorial in-game.

***

Code: Yanrishatum. Gamedesign, story: Shess. Art: ZeusDex. Sfx: Elvendan. Music: Theodote.
